The accommo_______ were rus___, b__ they adju____ after a few da__. They will probably make arrangements to return sometime soon.
data.fullContent: The Brown family vacationed in Illinois last summer, and had a terrific trip. They stayed in a spacious cabin by a lake, and grilled all their food on an outdoor fire. The accommodations were rustic, but they adjusted after a few days. They will probably make arrangements to return sometime soon.
data.answer: 布朗一家去年夏天去伊利诺斯州度假，度过了一次美妙的旅行。他们住在湖边一间宽敞的小木屋里，在户外的火上烤他们所有的食物。住宿条件很简陋，但几天后他们就适应了。他们可能会安排在不久的某个时候回来。
